item.title: OpenVPN Dark Pattern
item.description: OpenVPN Dark Pattern Okay, so giving the OpenVPN app five stars takes me straight to the App Store. But for anything less, they want me to “take a survey” ðŸ¥µ. Sure, rate the app. No way, Jose, take a survey.
